io.oasp.gastronomy.restaurant.offermanagement.logic.api

Interface Offermanagement

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    OffermanagementImpl

    public interface Offermanagement
    Interface for OfferManagement.

    • Method Detail

      • findOffer

        OfferEto findOffer(Long id)
        Gets an OfferEto using its entity identifier.
        Parameters:
        id - is the offer ID.
        Returns:
        the requested Offer or null if no such Offer exists.

      • findOfferCto

        OfferCto findOfferCto(Long id)
        Gets an OfferCto using its entity identifier.
        Parameters:
        id - is the offer ID.
        Returns:
        the requested Offer or null if no such Offer exists.

      • findAllOffers

        List<OfferEto> findAllOffers()
        Returns:
        the List with all available OfferEtos.

      • findOfferEtos

        io.oasp.module.jpa.common.api.to.PaginatedListTo<OfferEto> findOfferEtos(OfferSearchCriteriaTo criteria)
        Returns a list of offers matching the search criteria.
        Parameters:
        criteria - the OfferSearchCriteriaTo.
        Returns:
        the List of matching OfferEtos.

      • isProductInUseByOffer

        boolean isProductInUseByOffer(ProductEto product)
        Checks, whether a given ProductEto is in use by at least one OfferEto.
        Parameters:
        product - product to check if it is in use
        Returns:
        true, if there are no offers, that use the given ProductEto. false otherwise.

      • findOffersFiltered

        List<OfferEto> findOffersFiltered(OfferFilter offerFilterBo,
                                  OfferSortBy sortBy)
        Parameters:
        offerFilterBo - is the offers filter criteria
        sortBy - is the OfferSortBy attribute, which defines the sorting.
        Returns:
        the List with all OfferEtos that match the OfferFilter criteria.

      • deleteOffer

        void deleteOffer(Long offerId)
        Deletes an OfferEto by its id.
        Parameters:
        offerId - is the id that identifies the OfferEto to be deleted.

      • saveOffer

        OfferEto saveOffer(OfferEto offer)
        If no ID is contained creates the OfferEto for the first time. Else it updates the OfferEto with given ID. If no OfferEto with given ID is present, an exception will be thrown.
        Parameters:
        offer - the OfferEto to persist.
        Returns:
        the generated/updated offer

      • findProduct

        ProductEto findProduct(Long id)
        Gets a Product using its entity identifier.
        Parameters:
        id - is the product ID.
        Returns:
        the requested Product or null if no such Product exists.

      • findProductByRevision

        ProductEto findProductByRevision(Long id,
                                 Number revision)
        Gets a Product with a specific revision using its entity identifier and a revision.
        Parameters:
        id - is the product ID.
        revision - is the revision of the Product
        Returns:
        the requested Product or null if no such Product exists.

      • findMeal

        MealEto findMeal(Long id)
        Gets a Meal using its entity identifier.
        Parameters:
        id - is the product ID.
        Returns:
        the requested Meal or null if no such Meal exists.

        Returns:

      • findProductsFiltered

        List<ProductEto> findProductsFiltered(ProductFilter productFilterBo,
                                      ProductSortBy sortBy)
        Returns the List of filtered products sorted according to the specification.
        Parameters:
        productFilterBo - filter specification
        sortBy - sorting specification
        Returns:
        a List of filtered products

      • findProductPicture

        BinaryObjectEto findProductPicture(Long productId)
        Parameters:
        productId - the ID of the ProductEto to get the picture
        Returns:
        the BinaryObjectEto that contains meta data about the picture

      • findProductEtos

        io.oasp.module.jpa.common.api.to.PaginatedListTo<ProductEto> findProductEtos(ProductSearchCriteriaTo criteria)
        Returns a list of products matching the search criteria.
        Parameters:
        criteria - the ProductSearchCriteriaTo.
        Returns:
        the List of matching ProductEtos.

      • findProductPictureBlob

        Blob findProductPictureBlob(Long productId)
        Parameters:
        productId - the ID of the ProductEto to get the picture data
        Returns:
        the Blob that contains the data

      • saveProduct

        ProductEto saveProduct(ProductEto product)
        If no ID is contained creates the ProductEto for the first time. Else it updates the ProductEto with given ID. If no ProductEto with given ID is present, an exception will be thrown.
        Parameters:
        product - the ProductEto to persist.
        Returns:
        the persisted ProductEto.

      • deleteProduct

        void deleteProduct(Long productId)
        Deletes a ProductEto.
        Parameters:
        productId - is the ID of the ProductEto to delete

      • updateProductPicture

        void updateProductPicture(Long productId,
                          Blob blob,
                          BinaryObjectEto binaryObjectEto)
        Updates the picture of the product.
        Parameters:
        productId - is the ID of the ProductEto to update the picture
        blob - is the binary representation of the picture
        binaryObjectEto - is the mimeType of the blob

      • deleteProductPicture

        void deleteProductPicture(Long productId)
        Deletes the Picture of the ProductEto.
        Parameters:
        productId - is the ID of the ProductEto to delte the picture
